overwrite.description: When saving visualisation functions and file already exists, if 0 it doesn't compute it, if 1 it overwrites it.

hs_compute.description: If compute Hillshade. Parameter for GUIs.

hs_sun_azi.description: Solar azimuth angle (clockwise from North) in degrees.

hs_sun_el.description: Solar vertical angle (above the horizon) in degrees.

hs_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

hs_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

hs_shadow.description: If 1 it saves shadow binary raster, if 0 it doesn't.

hs_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

mhs_compute.description: If compute Multiple directions hillshade. Parameter for GUIs.

mhs_nr_dir.description: Number of solar azimuth angles (clockwise from North).

mhs_sun_el.description: Solar vertical angle (above the horizon) in degrees.

mhs_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

mhs_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

mhs_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

slp_compute.description: If compute Slope. Parameter for GUIs.

slp_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

slp_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

slp_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

slrm_compute.description: If compute Simple local relief model. Parameter for GUIs.

slrm_rad_cell.description: Radius for trend assessment in pixels.

slrm_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

slrm_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

slrm_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

msrm_compute.description: If compute Multi-scale relief model. Parameter for GUIs.

msrm_feature_min.description: Minimum size of the feature you want to detect in meters.

msrm_feature_max.description: Maximum size of the feature you want to detect in meters.

msrm_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

msrm_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

msrm_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

svf_compute.description: If compute Sky-View Factor. Parameter for GUIs.

svf_noise.description: The level of noise remove [0-don't remove, 1-low, 2-med, 3-high].

svf_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

svf_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

svf_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

asvf_compute.description: If compute Anisotropic Sky-View Factor. Parameter for GUIs.

asvf_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

pos_opns_compute.description: If compute Openness - Positive. Parameter for GUIs.

pos_opns_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

neg_opns_compute.description: If compute Openness - Negative. Parameter for GUIs.

neg_opns_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

neg_opns_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

neg_opns_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

sim_compute.description: If compute Sky illumination. Parameter for GUIs.

sim_compute_shadow.description: If 1 it computes shadows, if 0 it doesn't.

sim_shadow_dist.description: Max shadow modeling distance in pixels.

sim_nr_dir.description: Number of directions to search for horizon

sim_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

sim_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

sim_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

ld_compute.description: If compute Local dominance. Parameter for GUIs.

ld_min_rad.description: Minimum radial distance (in pixels) at which the algorithm starts with visualization computation.

ld_max_rad.description: Maximum radial distance (in pixels) at which the algorithm ends with visualization computation.

ld_anglr_res.description: Angular step for determination of number of angular directions.

ld_observer_h.description: Height at which we observe the terrain.

ld_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

ld_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

ld_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).

mstp_compute.description: If compute Multi-scale topographic position. Parameter for GUIs.

mstp_local_scale.description: Local scale minimum radius, maximum radius and step in pixels to calculate maximum mean deviation from elevation. All have to be integers!

mstp_meso_scale.description: Meso scale minimum radius, maximum radius and step in pixels to calculate maximum mean deviation from elevation. All have to be integers!

mstp_broad_scale.description: Broad scale minimum radius, maximum radius and step in pixels to calculate maximum mean deviation from elevation. All have to be integers!

mstp_lightness.description: Lightness factor to adjust MSTP visibility.

mstp_save_float.description: If 1 it saves float raster, if 0 it doesn't.

mstp_save_8bit.description: If 1 it saves 8bit raster, if 0 it doesn't.

mstp_bytscl.description: Linear stretch and byte scale (0-255) for 8bit raster. Mode can be 'value' or 'percent' (cut-off units). Values min and max define stretch borders (in mode units).
